text: (he nabee!) ve[1] sheeghr hee aapase kahenge, jo peechhe chhod diye gaye badduon mein se ki ham lage rah gaye apane dhanon tatha parivaar mein. atah, aap kshama kee praarthana kar den hamaare lie. ve apane mukhon se vo baat kahenge, jo unake dilon mein nahin hai. aap unase kahiye ki kaun hai, jo adhikaar rakhata ho tumhaare lie, allaah ke saamane kisee cheez ka, yadi allaah tumhen koee haani pahunchaana chaahe ya koee laabh pahunchaana chaahe? balki allaah soochit hai usase, jo tum kar rahe ho
